title: Ekko, new drawing and video

embed.description: SamuelRomero92 Twitter: https://twitter.com/SamuelRomero92 Fan Page: https://www.facebook.com/RetratosSamuelRomero Instagram: https://instagram.com/samuelromero92/ YouTube: www.youtube.com/user/samuelromero92 IMF Twitter: http://bit.ly/TwitterDDaviHer Fan Page: http://bit.ly/FaceIMF Web: http://itzmusicfree.net/ Google +: https://www.google.com/+itZMusicfree SoundCloud: http://bit.ly/SoundCludIMF ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ Song used Shy Kid - I DON'T WANT TO DIE https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rZXtUH68s6Y

body:
New drawing and video Ekko
I hope you like it! ^^

Twitter & Instagram : @SamuelRomero92

replies.body:
I like it!

Is the two-handed drawing technique you use at the start a signature of yours?  Why is it that you do that?
Your scribble/messy pen style is feels particularly appropriate for Ekko too - it looks like something I could imagine he'd draw himself on a piece of scrap paper, or that might turn up painted large on the side of a Zaun factory wall :D  

I will admit, the blank eyes weird me out a little though ;)
Wholey crap, 2 hand drawing at the same time???
OMG pls somebody give this guy a {{item:2052}}
